feed.title: Combined summary - Please help test 0.4.1 release candidate 1

entry.title: Combined summary - Please help test 0.4.1 release candidate 1
entry.summary: A stable git tree "v0.4.1rc1" has been tagged by an anonymous user following Gavin tagging 0.5rc1. Users have been requested to compile and help test if possible. For instructions on compiling, users can refer to the doc/build-*.txt files in the source tree. Binary releases for at least Unix and MAC will be available only if someone steps up to the task. There are no major changes from version 0.4.0, only bugfixes. Only those features in 0.4 are supported and not those from 0.5. A complete list of changes can be obtained by running "git shortlog --no-merges v0.4.0..". The anonymous user also thanked everyone who is contributing.
